ComicInfo.Summary:
The exciting conclusion to this action packed series brings Sable into the deadliest battle yet as enemies surround her on all sides. Victory will bring her the most sought after treasure in the galaxy...defeat will only cost her life.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | --------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Igor Vitorino & Jorge Cortes | 1 | B | Cover B | Ian Richardson & Hedwin Zaldivar | 2 | C | Cover C | Alfredo Reyes & Ceci de la Cruz | 3 | D | Cover D | Eric Wilkerson & Vinicius Andrade | 4 |
